testsuite.name: HonestCalculatorTest
testsuite.system-out: ?[1;31m Start test 1?[0m Enter an equation > 4 * 5 20.0 Do you want to store the result? (y / n): > y Do you want to continue calculations? (y / n): > n ?[1;31m Start test 2?[0m Enter an equation > 4 * 5.2 20.8 Do you want to store the result? (y / n): > y Do you want to continue calculations? (y / n): > y Enter an equation > 1 + M 21.8 Do you want to store the result? (y / n): > y Do you want to continue calculations? (y / n): > n ?[1;31m Start test 3?[0m Enter an equation > 2 + 5 7.0 Do you want to store the result? (y / n): > n Do you want to continue calculations? (y / n): > y Enter an equation > 21.0 / M Yeah... division by zero. Smart move... Enter an equation > 5 + M 5.0 Do you want to store the result? (y / n): > y Do you want to continue calculations? (y / n): > n
